title: Engineering Optimization
description: Topics include modeling with networks and graphs; linear, nonlinear, and integer programming, construction of models employing modern modeling languages; and general solution strategies.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (ISYE 2027 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (MATH 2602 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2603 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and CS 2316 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or (MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 3225 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 3235 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 3236 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
